text.div:
BC BreastCancerMCategoryCS CodeSystem

Codes that designate concepts describing Metastases category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

name: BreastCancerMCategoryCS
title: BC BreastCancerMCategoryCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Codes that designate concepts describing Metastases category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol M0 in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol M0 in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol cM1 in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol cM1 in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol pM1 in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol pM1 in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
